title: Loading Screen Splash Art Black
body:
Loading screen splash art is black, I've already repaired league and reinstalled it and still in black, Has anybody found a solution yet?
I Cant see my gold border I work so hard for ;w;

replies.body: Having same problem after patch 5.22{{champion:32}} . Riot pls fix this soon. Really wanted to see my silver border{{item:3070}}
Can't see champs or border, just black. Super annoying.
Have we solved this yet? Really annoying
same things exactly, except Im only silver lol
